doc.field: Gynex Inc said distributor Monsanto Co MTC> has recalled at Gynex's request two generic oral contraceptives developed by 50 pct-owned Gynex Laboratories Inc because some packages may contain out of order or missing tablets. The company said privately-held Watson Laboratories Inc>, owner of the other 50 pct of Gynex Laboratories, has temporarily suspended production of the products, and an inspection of the packaging operation is currently underway. It said corrective measures will be implemented to prevent a recurrence. Gynex said because of the recent introduction of the products, it believes only a limited number of packages have been dispensed to consumers. The products are Gynex 1-35E and Gynex 0.5-35E. Reuter
